pullrequest.title: backport fixes for ffmpeg3 to gazebo6 (from pull request #2154)

content.raw: I would have just submitted one to `gazebo5` and merged it forward, but there is a subtle difference in `ffmpeg_inc.h`. `GZ_COMMON_VISIBLE` is used in gazebo6 and on, while `GAZEBO_VISIBLE` was used in gazebo5.
content.html: I would have just submitted one to gazebo5 and merged it forward, but there is a subtle difference in ffmpeg_inc.h. GZ_COMMON_VISIBLE is used in gazebo6 and on, while GAZEBO_VISIBLE was used in gazebo5.
